channel.title: setup on Sangeet
channel.description: Recent content in setup on Sangeet

item.title: Setting Up OpenCV
item.description: I was trying to use the Tensorflow’s newly released Object Detection API on my webcam. I realised I couldn’t open webcam, OpenCV which was bundled with ROS was throwing all sorts of errors, I Googled and tried many hacky solution but all in vain. Now that my end sems were over I decided to install it fresh. This site : https://www.learnopencv.com/install-opencv3-on-ubuntu/ is a great walktrough through the installation process. It’s absolutely complete.

item.title: Setting Up CUDA
item.description: CUDA Set Up The last time I tried to fiddle with CUDA I got stuck in a login loop and had to reinstall Ubuntu. Last day again I was sitting in front of a fresh installation of Ubuntu and nightmares of last time’s Tensorflow GPU setup were all but moments away. Anyway I had to do it. But surprisingly this time it was short and simple ( simpler would hae been a better choice ).
